sys_ui_message.key:
for those wishing to return to absa, you will be required to perform a self-screening survey.
more information on the self-screening procedure can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yoazzvbrurfwwnv7srab6saijcr0y3nx/edit).
sys_ui_message.message:
For those wishing to return to Absa, you will be required to perform a self-screening survey.
More information on the self-screening procedure can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YOaZZvbRUrfWwnV7SrAb6SAiJcr0y3nx/edit).
